name: squared
description: Converts HTML and SVG into any mobile or desktop UI with the flexibility and accuracy of Chrome. CSS Grid, Flexbox, and CSS/SMIL animations are supported in the Android framework.

scripts.install-chrome: npm i terser && npm i prettier && npm i clean-css && npm i html-minifier && npm i js-beautify
scripts.bundles: node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.vdom.bundle.$npm_package_version.js
scripts.bundles-win: node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -o ./dist/bundles/squared.vdom.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f vdom -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.vdom.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js
scripts.md5-chromium: rimraf temp/chromium/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium -f 1
scripts.md5-chromium-raw: rimraf temp/chromium-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-raw -f 2 -t 10
scripts.md5-chromium-svg: rimraf temp/chromium-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chromium -o ./temp/chromium-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-chromium-diff-all: npm run md5-chromium && npm run md5-chromium-raw && npm run md5-chromium-svg && npm run md5-chromium-diff && npm run md5-chromium-diff-raw && npm run md5-chromium-diff-svg
scripts.md5-chromium-diff-rebase-all: node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master ./temp/chromium && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master-raw ./temp/chromium-raw && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/chromium/master-svg ./temp/chromium-svg
scripts.md5-firefox: rimraf temp/firefox/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox -f 1
scripts.md5-firefox-raw: rimraf temp/firefox-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox-raw -f 2 -t 10
scripts.md5-firefox-svg: rimraf temp/firefox-svg/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b firefox -o ./temp/firefox-svg -f 4
scripts.md5-firefox-diff-all: npm run md5-firefox && npm run md5-firefox-raw && npm run md5-firefox-svg && npm run md5-firefox-diff && npm run md5-firefox-diff-raw && npm run md5-firefox-diff-svg
scripts.md5-firefox-diff-rebase-all: node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master ./temp/firefox && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master-raw ./temp/firefox-raw && node md5sum.js -z -c ./md5/firefox/master-svg ./temp/firefox-svg
scripts.dev: tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.dev.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.dev.js && cd ./framework/android && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ../chrome && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ../vdom && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js
scripts.prod: npm run clean && eslint **/*.ts && tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.prod.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.js && cd ./node/express && eslint **/*.ts && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../../framework/android && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../chrome && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../vdom && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../../extension/android/widget && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*
